meanings.definition: The act of getting on or into a vehicle or ship.
meanings.sent1: After the boarding, the bus started moving.
meanings.sent2: The boarding process at the airport was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent3: The boarding of the train turned into a race between friends.
meanings.sent4: Her boarding onto the cruise ship felt like stepping into a new adventure.
meanings.sent5: The boarding onto the spaceship was a moment of excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: The act of providing meals and lodging for a fee.
meanings.sent1: The boarding at the hotel included breakfast and dinner.
meanings.sent2: The boarding house was known for its delicious home-cooked meals.
meanings.sent3: The boarding at the inn made the travelers feel right at home.
meanings.sent4: The boarding at the bed and breakfast was a cozy experience.
meanings.sent5: The boarding at the hostel was affordable and comfortable for backpackers.

meanings.definition: The act of covering a surface with boards or planks.
meanings.sent1: The boarding of the floor with wooden planks gave the room a rustic look.
meanings.sent2: The boarding of the walls with panels added a touch of elegance to the house.
meanings.sent3: The boarding of the stage with colorful boards created a vibrant backdrop.
meanings.sent4: The boarding of the fence with sturdy planks enhanced the security of the property.
meanings.sent5: The boarding of the deck with smooth planks made it a perfect spot for relaxation.
